if (WIN32 OR WIN64)
    if(CMAKE_SIZEOF_VOID_P EQUAL 8)
        set(SDL2_LIBRARIES "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bin/x64/SDL2.lib" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bin/x64/SDL2main.lib" CACHE STRING "" FORCE)
        set(SDL2_DLLS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bin/x64/SDL2.dll" CACHE STRING "" FORCE)
    else()
        set(SDL2_LIBRARIES "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bin/x86/SDL2.lib" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bin/x86/SDL2main.lib" CACHE STRING "" FORCE)
        set(SDL2_DLLS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bin/x86/SDL2.dll" CACHE STRING "" FORCE)
    endif()
    set(SDL2_INCLUDE_DIRS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include" CACHE STRING "" FORCE)
endif ()
